context: Pinapples are great on pizza and you can't tell me otherwise!
Don't get me wrong. I like weddings as much as the next girl, but do I really need pay $30,000 to marry my husband?

thought: stop turning on your turning signal right before you turn
context: The point of a turning signal is to alert other drivers of your intentions! Turning them on just before you turn defeats the purpose because it doesn't give anyone time to adjust! So frustrating!

thought: people who steal food from communal fridges make me angry
context: Who in their right mind thinks it's OK to rummage through the office fridge like they're at home? You didn't buy the food, nor do you own the fridge. Show some respect!
